00002 #define MCL_BINARY_DUMP_H
00003 
00004 #define DUMP_APPEND 1
00005 #define DUMP_BUFFER 1
00006 
00007 #include <iostream>
00008 #include <fstream>
00009 #include <string>
00010 #include <vector>
00011 #include "types.h"

00013 class odump
00014 {
00015         public:
00016                 odump() {
00017                         amode = std::ios::out|std::ios::binary;
00018                         bmode = DUMP_BUFFER;
00019                 }
00020                 odump(int app_flag) { 
00021                         if(app_flag == DUMP_APPEND) amode = std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::app; 
00022                         else amode = std::ios::out|std::ios::binary;
00023                         bmode = DUMP_BUFFER;
00024                 }
00025                 odump(int app_flag, int buffer_flag) { 
00026                         if(app_flag == DUMP_APPEND) amode = std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::app; 
00027                         else amode = std::ios::out|std::ios::binary;
00028                         bmode = buffer_flag;
00029                 }
00030                 odump(std::string fn) {
00031                         amode = std::ios::out|std::ios::binary; 
00032                         bmode = DUMP_BUFFER;
00033                         open(fn);
00034                 }
00035                 odump(std::string fn, int app_flag) {
00036                         if(app_flag == DUMP_APPEND) amode = std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::app; 
00037                         else amode = std::ios::out|std::ios::binary;
00038                         bmode = DUMP_BUFFER;
00039                         open(fn);
00040                 }
00041                 odump(std::string fn, int app_flag, int buffer_flag) {
00042                         if(app_flag == DUMP_APPEND) amode = std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::app; 
00043                         else amode = std::ios::out|std::ios::binary;
00044                         bmode = buffer_flag;
00045                         open(fn);
00046                 }
00047                 ~odump() { if (is_open) close();}
00048                 void open(std::string fn) {
00049                         if (bmode==DUMP_BUFFER) {
00050                                 filename=fn;
00051                                 fn+=".buf";
00052                         }
00053                         binary_file.open(fn.c_str(),amode);
00054                         is_open=1;
00055                 }  
00056                 void close() {
00057                         binary_file.close();
00058                         if (bmode==DUMP_BUFFER) {
00059                                 std::string co="mv -f "+filename+".buf "+filename;
00060                                 system(co.c_str());
00061                         }
00062                         is_open=0;      
00063                 }
00064                 template <class Type> void write(std::vector<Type>&);
00065                 template <class Type> void write(Type*, int);
00066                 template <class Type> void write(Type&);
00067                 void write(std::string&);
00068 
00069         private:
00070                 std::string filename;
00071                 std::ofstream binary_file;
00072                 std::ios_base::openmode amode;
00073                 int bmode;
00074                 int is_open;
00075 };

00077 class idump
00078 {
00079         public:
00080                 idump() {}
00081                 idump(std::string filename) {open(filename);}
00082                 ~idump() {close();}
00083                 bool operator!() {return !binary_file;}
00084                 bool good() {return !(!binary_file);}
00085                 void open(std::string filename) {binary_file.open(filename.c_str(),std::ios::in|std::ios::binary);}
00086                 template <class Type> void read(std::vector<Type>&);
00087                 template <class Type> void read(Type*, int);
00088                 template <class Type> void read(Type&);
00089                 void read(std::string&);
00090                 void close() {binary_file.close();}
00091         private:
00092                 std::ifstream binary_file;
00093 };
00094 
00095 template<class Type>
00096 void odump :: write(std::vector<Type>& v) {
00097         luint n=v.size();
00098         write(n);
00099         for (uint i=0;i<n;++i)
00100                 write(v[i]);
00101 }
00102 
00103 template <class Type>
00104 void odump :: write(Type *a, int size)
00105 {
00106         binary_file.write((char*)a, size*sizeof(Type));
00107 }
00108 
00109 template <class Type>
00110 void odump :: write(Type& a)
00111 {
00112         binary_file.write((char*)(&a), sizeof(Type));
00113 }
00114 
00115 template<class Type>
00116 void idump :: read(std::vector<Type>& v) {
00117         luint n;
00118         read(n);
00119         for (uint i=0;i<n;++i) {
00120                 Type nel;
00121                 read(nel);
00122                 v.push_back(nel);
00123         }
00124 }
00125 
00126 template <class Type>
00127 void idump :: read(Type *a, int size)
00128 {
00129         binary_file.read((char*)a,size*sizeof(Type));
00130 }
00131 
00132 template <class Type>
00133 void idump :: read(Type& a)
00134 {
